ModMetaData.name: Gwen's Gone Mental Traits
ModMetaData.author: gwen blanket knight
ModMetaData.description: This mod adds 15 traits that affect how colonists perceive the world around them. [img=https://imgur.com/tb0yhC6[/img] [img=https://imgur.com/vjSnXNF[/img] [img=https://imgur.com/fcb8iy2[/img] [img=https://imgur.com/IHqdN1w[/img] [img=https://imgur.com/Lsbb6Kx[/img] [img=https://imgur.com/26hi5fm[/img] [img=https://imgur.com/ww0HU7o[/img] [img=https://imgur.com/4ioyU2V[/img] [img=https://imgur.com/ooYAPXy[/img] [img=https://imgur.com/qQXjXnm[/img] [img=https://imgur.com/qQXjXnm[/img] [img=https://imgur.com/iYN7oYc[/img] [img=https://imgur.com/oJIFHst[/img] [img=https://imgur.com/vzHfIgM[/img] [img=https://imgur.com/oXrX0wQ[/img] [img=https://imgur.com/FII3UZL[/img] [h1]SUPPORT THE MOD![/h1] You can support the mod by commenting on balance, making bug reports, and offering suggestions. You can also click these buttons to push the mod closer to the front page of the workshop. This is the best method for discovery other than word of mouth. [img=https://i.imgur.com/fVVaDCS.gif[/img] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/GwenLilyKnight/myworkshopfiles/?appid=281990]You can also follow my workshop page to see when a new mod is posted or check out my catalog[img]https://i.imgur.com/r1EtYC9.png[/img][/url]
